casebody.data:
HARRIS
v.
IREDELL COUNTY, et al. 310P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Christopher Charles Harris, for Harris, Christopher Charles. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of September 2018 by Plaintiff to Compel Iredell County Superior Court to Allow Plaintiff to Proceed as Indigent: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018." Ervin, J. recused
